9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Jabir bin Abdullah narrated:"A woman held a boy of hers up for the Messenger of Allah and said: 'O Messenger of Allah! Is there Hajj for this one' He said: 'Yes, and you will be rewarded

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي حَجِّ الصَّبِيِّ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Hajj Of A Boy
